author: Deleted User
content: will eip-4488/90 make rollups less impacted by fee spikes on L1? For example optimism has costed like $14 to make a ETH transfer when there was high basefee on L1. But will 4488/90 make the spikes less impactful on L2 ?

author: Deleted User
content: encouraging more users to use rollups with protocol level subsidies ala EIP4488/90 seems reckless. Why not wait a year or two until they are more mature? Some of the most popular rollups dont even seem to have fraudproofs ready or any escape hatch mechanisms yet. Lets try and avoid another TheDAO? ðŸ˜›
